metadata.title: CVE-2018-7563 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GLPI through 9.2.1. The application is affectedby XSS in the query string to front/preference.php. An attacker is able tocreate a malicious URL that, if opened by an authenticated user with debugprivilege, will execute JavaScript code supplied by the attacker. Theattacker-supplied code can perform a wide variety of actions, such asstealing the victim's session token or login credentials, performingarbitrary actions on the victim's behalf, and logging their keystrokes.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
